textBeforeTable: For your information: The Greek authorities donÂ´t allow a timing system like in international use. So the "real" driven times will be pointed with penalties, this penalties were added and will represent the positions. For example: Participant X has 02:40:39 "real time". Allowed was 02:00:00, so they get a penalty of 00:40:29, which is the counted time for this stage.
